title: Hughes-Cromwick on Economy: Early Signs of Improvement (Audio)
itunes:title: Hughes-Cromwick on Economy: Early Signs of Improvement (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Ellen Hughes-Cromwick, Chief Economist at the US Department of Commerce, on the economy, GDP numbers, and their work in improving economic statistics.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
